text.*:
This a partial list of glacial moraines. They are arranged by continents and divided by related hydrologic basins. This list is incomplete. Please improve the listing.

Contents

  • 1 North America
    • 1.1 Moraines of the Great Lakes Region
      • 1.1.1 Lake Ontario Basin
      • 1.1.2 Lake Erie Basin
      • 1.1.3 Lake Huron Basin
        • 1.1.3.1 Saginaw lobe
        • 1.1.3.2 Interlobate ‘thumb’ of Michigan
      • 1.1.4 Lake Michigan Basin
      • 1.1.5 Lake Superior Basin
    • 1.2 Moraines of the Quebec and Ontario, Canada
    • 1.3 Moraines of the Maritimes of Canada and NE United States
    • 1.4 Moraines of Western Canada
    • 1.5 Moraines of the Great Plains of the United States
    • 1.6 Moraines of the U.S. and Canadian Rocky Mountains
  • 2 Europe
  • 3 Antarctica
    • 3.1 Queen Maud Land
    • 3.2 Ross Dependency
  • 4 South America
  • 5 References
